title: Home | Renquist Chiro
cleaned_text: Book an appointment We are Renquist Chiropractic and Acupuncture, an Integrated Medicine Clinic in Salem. Renquist Chiropractic and Acupuncture is a family owned and operated clinic that has been helping heal the residents of the Salem area since 1979. We are dedicated to the well-being of this community and our vision is to serve our patients by supporting them in creating health and vitality in their lives. Along with this holistic model of wellness care, we also have vast experience in the area of pain management and rehab for acute, chronic, and sports related injuries. Our office is conveniently located in downtown Salem near the Salem Memorial Hospital and offers a wide variety of services, including: Chinese Herbal Medicine, Acupuncture, Manual and Light Force Chiropractic Techniques, Myofascial Release Techniques, and Rehabilitation/Physiotherapy. For your assistance, we accept most major insurance companies, including auto accident, personal injury, and Worker's Compensation claims. If you are interested in becoming a new patient, we are happy to work with you to better understand if your insurance benefits cover the services we offer. Give our office a call to get the verification and registration process started. We look forward to welcoming you to Renquist Chiropractic and Acupuncture! Office Hours Monday 9am-1pm 3pm-7pm Saturday By Appointment Sunday Closed
